scripts.startDev-staging: yarn workspace functions watch & sh -ac '. ./.env.local.staging; react-scripts start' & sh -ac '. ./.env.local.staging; firebase use growtech-staging; firebase serve --only functions --port 3030'
scripts.startDev-production: yarn workspace functions watch & sh -ac '. ./.env.local.production; react-scripts start' & sh -ac '. ./.env.local.production; firebase use growtech-production; firebase serve --only functions --port 3030'
scripts.serve-staging: yarn build-staging; sh -ac '. ./.env.local.staging; firebase use growtech-staging; firebase serve --only functions,hosting'
scripts.serve-production: yarn build-production; sh -ac '. ./.env.local.production; firebase use growtech-production; firebase serve --only functions,hosting'
scripts.deploy-staging: yarn build-staging; firebase use growtech-staging; firebase deploy --only functions,hosting
scripts.deploy-production: yarn build-production; firebase use growtech-production; firebase deploy --only functions,hosting
scripts.build-staging: sh -ac '. ./.env.staging; react-scripts build'; yarn workspace functions build
scripts.build-production: sh -ac '. ./.env.production; react-scripts build'; yarn workspace functions build
